data.comment: The big names in today's match at Estadio Victoria have now been confirmed.
The match has started at Estadio Victoria.
In the minute 1, Doria for Santos Laguna is whistled offside.
Free kick for Necaxa in the half of Santos Laguna.
Necaxa are pushing forward but Julio Gonzalez's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 3, Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez awards Santos Laguna a goal kick.
In Aguascalientes a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Aguascalientes to check on Joao Rodriguez, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 5, Joao Rodriguez returns to the field for Necaxa after picking up a slight injury.
Throw-in for Necaxa in their own half.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez signals a Necaxa throw-in in Santos Laguna's half.
In the minute 6, Santos Laguna will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Necaxa.
Maximiliano Salas of Necaxa gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Santos Laguna goal kick.
In the minute 8, Free kick for Santos Laguna in their own half.
Diego Valdes (Santos Laguna) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Throw-in for Necaxa in the half of Santos Laguna.
In the minute 9, Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez awards the home team a throw-in.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez signals a free kick to Santos Laguna in their own half.
Corner awarded to Santos Laguna.
In the minute 11, Necaxa awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Necaxa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Necaxa close to the penalty box.
In the minute 14, Necaxa's David Cabrera gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Santos Laguna at Estadio Victoria.
Santos Laguna push forward at Estadio Victoria and Diego Valdes gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Necaxa defence.
In the minute 16, Santos Laguna drive forward but Alan Cervantes is judged offside.
Necaxa awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Necaxa.
In the minute 19, Necaxa have been awarded a corner by Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez.
Necaxa to take a throw-in in Santos Laguna territory.
Throw-in for Necaxa at Estadio Victoria.
In the minute 20, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Can Necaxa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Santos Laguna's half?
Throw-in Necaxa.
In the minute 21, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Lucas Passerini (Necaxa) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Maximiliano Salas for Necaxa drives towards goal at Estadio Victoria. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 23, Can Santos Laguna capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Necaxa's half?
Santos Laguna's Alan Cervantes gets in a shot on goal at Estadio Victoria. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez signals a throw-in for Santos Laguna, close to Necaxa's area.
In the minute 25, Necaxa have a goal kick.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez signals a free kick to Santos Laguna in their own half.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez signals a free kick to Necaxa.
In the minute 28, Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez signals a Necaxa throw-in in Santos Laguna's half.
Necaxa have been awarded a corner by Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez.
Free kick for Santos Laguna in their own half.
In the minute 29, Lucas Passerini (Necaxa) gets a yellow card.
Necaxa's Lucas Passerini misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Aguascalientes.
In the minute 31, Necaxa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Aguascalientes a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Attention is being given to Necaxa’s Lucas Passerini and play has been suspended briefly.
Goal kick for Santos Laguna at Estadio Victoria.
In the minute 33, Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez waits before resuming play because Felix Torres for Santos Laguna is still down.
Necaxa’s Lucas Passerini is on his feet again at Estadio Victoria.
In the minute 34, Free kick Santos Laguna.
Goal! Santos Laguna take a 0-1 lead through a well-placed header from Doria.
That's a fine assist from Diego Valdes.
In the minute 36, Santos Laguna's Felix Torres looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez signals a free kick to Necaxa.
Necaxa to take a throw-in in Santos Laguna territory.
In the minute 38, Necaxa pushes forward through Lucas Passerini, whose finish on goal is saved.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Aguascalientes.
Ball goes out of play for a Necaxa goal kick.
In the minute 42, Corner awarded to Necaxa.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez signals a free kick to Santos Laguna in their own half.
Doria is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
In the minute 45, Doria is back on the pitch.
Throw-in for Santos Laguna in their own half.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez awards Santos Laguna a goal kick.
In the minute 45, Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez will wait an extra 2 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
Free kick for Necaxa in their own half.
Santos Laguna have a goal kick.
In the minute 45, Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez blows to end the first-half.
The second-half is now underway.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 46, Santos Laguna awarded a free kick in their own half.
Necaxa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez signals a free kick to Necaxa in their own half.
In the minute 49, Free kick for Necaxa in the half of Santos Laguna.
Goal kick for Santos Laguna at Estadio Victoria.
Free kick for Santos Laguna in their own half.
In the minute 51, Felix Torres is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In Aguascalientes a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Felix Torres is back on his feet again.
In the minute 53, Throw-in for Santos Laguna in the half of Necaxa.
Necaxa awarded a free kick in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Aguascalientes.
In the minute 56, Santos Laguna make their first substitution with Octavio Rivero replacing Eduardo Aguirre.
Santos Laguna are coming forward and Julio Furch gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Necaxa have a goal kick.
In the minute 58, Ball safe as Necaxa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Necaxa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Santos Laguna's half?
Throw-in for Santos Laguna at Estadio Victoria.
In the minute 59, Martin Barragan is replacing Maximiliano Salas for Necaxa at Estadio Victoria.
Luis Alfonso Sosa is making the team's second substitution at Estadio Victoria with Alex Zendejas replacing Joao Rodriguez.
David Cabrera of Necaxa gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 60, Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez awards Santos Laguna a goal kick.
Throw-in Santos Laguna.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 61, Claudio Baeza gets an equalizer for Necaxa. The score is now 1-1.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez signals a free kick to Santos Laguna.
Important block from the Necaxa defence as Diego Valdes fires in a strike for Santos Laguna.
In the minute 63, Santos Laguna have been awarded a corner by Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez.
Santos Laguna are coming forward and Julio Furch gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Necaxa goal kick.
In the minute 64, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Felix Torres for Santos Laguna who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Santos Laguna awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Santos Laguna get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Necaxa's half?
In the minute 66, Felix Torres for Santos Laguna is back on the field again.
Corner awarded to Necaxa.
Necaxa move into a 2-1 lead through a Unai Bilbao header.
In the minute 67, David Cabrera with an assist there.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Aguascalientes.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez signals a free kick to Santos Laguna in their own half.
Santos Laguna drive upfield and Diego Valdes gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Necaxa defender.
Corner awarded to Santos Laguna.
In the minute 69, Jair Gonzalez is replacing David Andrade for the away team.
In the minute 70, Free kick for Necaxa in their own half.
Throw-in for Necaxa in the half of Santos Laguna.
Throw-in high up the field for Necaxa in Aguascalientes.
In the minute 71, Necaxa to take a throw-in in Santos Laguna territory.
Necaxa's Claudio Baeza misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Santos Laguna goal kick.
In the minute 72, Throw-in for Santos Laguna in their own half.
Necaxa drives forward and Lucas Passerini gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Necaxa have been awarded a corner by Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez.
In the minute 74, Goal kick for Santos Laguna at Estadio Victoria.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez signals a Santos Laguna throw-in in Necaxa's half.
Necaxa needs to be cautious. Santos Laguna have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 75, Necaxa awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Santos Laguna.
Unai Bilbao (Necaxa) has received a yellow card from Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez.
In the minute 78, Santos Laguna's Diego Valdes is on target but unsuccessful.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Santos Laguna are pushing forward but Doria's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 79, Necaxa have a goal kick.
The match at Estadio Victoria has been interrupted briefly for a check on David Cabrera, who is down injured.
Free kick for Santos Laguna in the half of Necaxa.
In the minute 82, David Cabrera has recovered and rejoins the match in Aguascalientes.
David Cabrera (Necaxa) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Fernando Arce is on a sub for Juan Delgado for Necaxa.
In the minute 85, Jorge Guillermo Almada (Santos Laguna) is making a third substitution, with Jordan Carrillo replacing Ulises Rivas.
Corner awarded to Santos Laguna.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez signals a free kick to Necaxa in their own half.
In the minute 87, Free kick for Santos Laguna in their own half.
Throw-in for Necaxa at Estadio Victoria.
Santos Laguna have been awarded a corner by Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez.
In the minute 89, Can Santos Laguna capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Can Santos Laguna get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Necaxa's half?
Necaxa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
The fourth official's board shows 6 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez awards Necaxa a goal kick.
Ball safe as Santos Laguna is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Santos Laguna in their own half.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez awards Necaxa a goal kick.
Necaxa awarded a free kick in their own half.
Necaxa to take a throw-in in Santos Laguna territory.
The match is over. Final score 2-1.
The home team replace Lucas Passerini with Mario De Luna.
